name: UURL
body:
URL Shortener made with Python, Bottle.py, Redis and gevent

- stats and url data stored with Redis, using HASH datatype
- monkey patch and server adapter for WSGI and GEvent
- supervisord config file to keep running
- included: bookmarklet, stats page, API

INSTALL

install python-redis (thru apt, or easy_install redis)
install python-gevent (or easy_install gevent - which is not good because it needs gcc installed)

Preview
http://chu.pe
tagline: url shortener made with python, bottle, redis and gevent
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
